item.title: 万斯称美国在不断升级的中国贸易争端中握有更多牌面
item.description: 美国副总统万斯（JD Vance）呼吁中国政府在中美之间最近不断升级的贸易斗争中 "选择理性之路"，并声称美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）拥有更多的筹码。【原文：Vice President JD Vance called on Beijing to “choose the path of reason” in the latest spiraling trade fight between the US and China, claiming that President Donald Trump has more leverage.】

item.title: PKO 银行考虑向散户投资者出售更多担保债券
item.description: 波兰最大的贷款机构 PKO Bank Polski SA 在首次发行担保债券筹集到 11.6 亿兹罗提（3.15 亿美元）后，正在考虑向个人投资者出售更多担保债券。【原文：PKO Bank Polski SA, Poland’s largest lender, is weighing the sale of more covered bonds to individual investors after it raised 1.16 billion zloty ($315 million) from its maiden issuance.】

item.title: 特朗普的中国威胁为铜牛市的 LME 周派对蒙上阴影
item.description: 随着铜价屡创新高，交易商们上周末在伦敦参加了金属行业最大的一次聚会，情绪高涨。【原文：With copper prices racing towards record highs, traders were in a bullish mood late last week as they descended on London for the largest gathering in the metals calendar.】

item.title: 期权专家迎来 2022 年以来最疯狂的盈利季节之一
item.description: 投资者再次为财报日的股票大涨做准备，在创下历史新高后摇摇欲坠的市场中斥资投机。【原文：Investors are once again preparing for big earnings-day stock moves, paying up to speculate in a market that’s faltering after it reached a record high.】

item.title: 美国加征关税，瑞士与中国将加速贸易谈判
item.description: 瑞士正在寻求与中国在贸易方面进行更紧密的合作，瑞士与美国政府的谈判仍在继续，试图将关税税率从创纪录的水平降低。【原文：The Swiss are seeking closer collaboration on trade with China as Switzerland’s talks with the US administration continue in an attempt to lower tariff rates from a record level.】

item.title: 普京在罢工中放宽对炼油厂的燃油补贴规定
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）放宽了对本国炼油企业的燃料补贴规定，允许它们在乌克兰加强对炼油行业的攻击之际继续获得数十亿卢布的援助。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin relaxed the rules on fuel subsidies to the nation’s refiners, allowing them to continue receiving billions of rubles in aid amid intensified Ukrainian attacks on the industry.】

item.title: 牛市三周年，必须有更多股票加入才能维持下去
item.description: 本周日将迎来美股牛市三周年纪念日，但如果以历史为鉴，牛市需要尽快扩大范围才能继续运行。【原文：The bull market in US stocks is having its third anniversary on Sunday, but if history is any guide it needs to broaden out soon to keep running.】

item.title: 新兴市场动态：企业危机令交易员恐慌（播客）
item.description: 玛丽亚-埃莱娜-维斯凯诺（Maria Elena Vizcaino）在纽约与宋子嘉一起讨论从圣保罗到伊斯坦布尔的企业爆炸事件如何震撼新兴市场公司债的投资者，以及这种情况是否会蔓延到其他资产类别。【原文：Maria Elena Vizcaino joins Zijia Song in New York to discuss how corporate blowups from Sao Paulo to Istanbul are rattling investors of emerging markets company debt and whether it’ll spread to the rest of the asset class.】

item.title: 企业爆炸事件令新兴市场投资者惶恐不安
item.description: 从圣保罗到伊斯坦布尔，公司债券的溃败正向投资者发出信号，新兴市场的一枝独秀可能开始出现一些裂痕。【原文：Corporate bond routs from Sao Paulo to Istanbul are signaling to investors that the standout run in emerging markets may be starting to show some cracks.】

item.title: 世界经济面临关税、人工智能泡沫和债务飙升的三重风险
item.description: 由于美国消费者继续消费，企业消化了更高的成本，而人工智能的蓬勃发展又激发了新的动物精神，世界经济迄今已经受住了美国自 20 世纪 30 年代以来最大规模关税的冲击。【原文：The world economy has so far withstood the biggest barrage of US tariffs since the 1930s as American consumers continued to spend, companies absorbed higher costs and an AI boom fueled a new breed of animal spirits.】

item.title: 苹果从 "Vision Air "耳机到类似元智能眼镜的转型内幕
item.description: 在与 Meta 的新型嵌入式显示屏智能眼镜相处了一周之后，我确信苹果从所谓的 Vision Air 转向眼镜的决定是正确的。另外：公司开始调整高管团队，最新产品发布在即。【原文：After spending a week with Meta’s new display-embedded smart glasses, I’m convinced that Apple made the right call pivoting from the so-called Vision Air to spectacles. Also: The company begins reshuffling its executive team, and its latest product launch is imminent.】

item.title: 政治溢价正在惩罚从巴黎到东京的债券
item.description: 法国和日本的动荡凸显了政治正取代央行政策成为全球市场的主要驱动力，债券持有者希望以更高的溢价持有发达国家政府的债务。【原文：Bond holders want an ever-higher premium to hold the debt of developed-nation governments as turmoil in France and Japan underscores how politics is eclipsing central bank policy globally as a key market driver.】

item.title: 民航总局命令印度航空公司重新检查波音 787 飞机的部分系统
item.description: 据印度报业托拉斯（Press Trust India）报道，印度航空监管机构指示印度航空公司（Air India Ltd.）重新检查其波音787飞机上的应急电源系统，该系统最近更换了模块。【原文：India’s aviation regulator directed Air India Ltd. to reinspect an emergency power system on its Boeing 787 aircrafts on which the module was recently replaced, the Press Trust of India reported.】

item.title: 英国为中国间谍案失败的处理方式辩护，审查日益加剧
item.description: 英国一名大臣坚称，政府没有干预对两名被控为中国从事间谍活动的男子的起诉流产，因为人们越来越关注高级官员在此案失败中所扮演的角色。【原文：A UK minister has insisted the government didn’t intervene in an aborted prosecution of two men accused of spying for China amid growing scrutiny over the role of senior officials in the collapse of the case.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦与阿富汗激烈交火，冲突演变为致命冲突
item.description: 巴基斯坦和阿富汗在其共同边界上激烈交火，这两个邻国之间的紧张局势在连日的冲突和双方都被指控侵犯对方领土之后不断升级。【原文：Pakistan and Afghanistan exchanged heavy fire along their shared border, as tensions between the two neighbors escalated after days of clashes and accusations that each have breached the other’s territory.】

item.title: 中国市场面临美国重启贸易战风险的威胁
item.description: 北京和华盛顿之间重燃贸易战的前景有可能破坏今年中国股市的强劲反弹，并对人民币造成压力。【原文：The prospect of a revived trade war between Beijing and Washington is threatening to undermine this year’s blistering rally in Chinese stocks and weigh on the yuan.】

item.title: 习近平对美国出口限制的反击暴露了达成协议的艰难之路
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）违反双方脆弱的贸易休战协议条款的激烈回应，再次引发了针锋相对的漩涡，暴露了中美贸易协议的坎坷之路。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping’s blistering response to Donald Trump violating the terms of their fragile trade truce has reignited a tit-for-tat spiral, exposing the rocky path to any US-China trade deal.】

item.title: 英国家庭债务创 23 年新低，为消费复苏带来希望
item.description: 在经历了对英国经济造成沉重打击的支出紧缩期之后，英国家庭的资产负债表达到了二十多年来的最佳状态。对于政治家和英国央行来说，问题是：消费者现在是否有足够的信心放松银根？【原文：UK household balance sheets are in their best shape for over two decades after a period of spending restraint that has taken a heavy toll on the British economy. For politicians and the Bank of England, the question is: Will consumers now feel confident enough to loosen the purse strings?】

item.title: 澳航称网络攻击后被盗客户数据已发布到网上
item.description: 澳洲航空公司（Qantas Airways Ltd.）表示，在 7 月份的一次网络事件中被盗的客户数据已经在网上公布，该公司正在与安全专家和澳大利亚当局合作，以确定数据泄露的程度。【原文：Qantas Airways Ltd. said customer data stolen during a cyber incident in July has been released online, and that it’s working with security experts and Australian authorities to determine the extent of the exposure.】

item.title: 新加坡房地产热再度升温，项目几近售罄
item.description: 新加坡的一个私人住宅项目在首个周末的销售中几近售罄，这凸显出尽管政府采取了多轮降温措施，新加坡的住宅市场仍持续火爆。【原文：A private home project in Singapore saw a near sellout in its first weekend of sales, underscoring the city-state’s persistently hot residential market despite multiple rounds of government cooling measures.】

item.title: 中国要求美国停止关税威胁，并敦促举行更多会谈
item.description: 针对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普针对北京采取的最新措施，中国表示美国应停止以提高关税相威胁，并敦促就悬而未决的问题进行更多谈判，以达成贸易协议。【原文：China said the US should stop threatening it with higher tariffs and urged more negotiations on outstanding issues to agree on a trade deal, responding to President Donald Trump’s latest measures against Beijing.】

item.title: 两宗数十亿美元的首次公开募股考验印度热门 IPO 市场的实力
item.description: 塔塔资本有限公司（Tata Capital Ltd.）和 LG 电子印度有限公司（LG Electronics India Ltd.）完成了今年印度最大的两宗首次公开募股后，将于未来几天在孟买开始交易。【原文：Tata Capital Ltd. and LG Electronics India Ltd. will begin trading in Mumbai over the next couple of days after they concluded two of the nation’s biggest initial public offerings this year, with their debuts set to test the strength of one of the world’s hottest equity capital markets.】

item.title: 年龄》杂志称，澳大利亚正酝酿与美国达成协议，成立 7.77 亿美元的稀土基金
item.description: 据《时代报》周日报道，澳大利亚正在考虑为关键矿物设定最低价格，并投资新的稀土项目，作为与美国潜在资源交易的一部分。【原文：Australia is considering setting minimum prices for critical minerals and investing in new rare-earth projects as part of a potential resources deal with the US, the Age reported Sunday.】

item.title: 英国外交大臣斯塔默将出席在埃及举行的中东和平峰会
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默将于周一前往埃及出席加沙和平计划的签字仪式。【原文：British Prime Minister Keir Starmer will travel to Egypt to attend the signing ceremony of the peace plan for Gaza on Monday.】

item.title: 加密货币创纪录的大跌引发了对 "谁被消灭 "的好奇心
item.description: 在加密货币经历了最大单日抛售之后的第二天，业内每个人都在试图找出谁是最后的赢家。【原文：The day after crypto experienced its biggest one-day selloff, everyone in the industry was trying to figure out who was left holding the bag.】

item.title: 股市泡沫恐慌笼罩华盛顿央行官员
item.description: 已经对贸易紧张局势和公共债务膨胀感到不安的各国央行行长们，将在下周共同面对一个新的担忧：市场崩溃的危险。【原文：Central bankers, already uneasy about trade tensions and swelling public debt, will collectively confront a new worry in the coming week: the danger of a market crash.】

item.title: 南非贸易部长称即将与美国达成关税协议
item.description: 南非贸易部长帕克斯-陶（Parks Tau）表示，与美国的贸易协议非常接近，但没有提供细节。【原文：South African Trade Minister Parks Tau said a trade deal with the US was very close, without providing details.】

item.title: 贝森特发表阿根廷言论后，中国指责美国恃强凌弱
item.description: 在美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特暗示阿根廷总统 "致力于让中国退出 "之后，中国指责美国对拉美进行冷战时期的干预。【原文：China accused the US of Cold War-era intervention in Latin America after Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent suggested Argentina’s president was “committed to getting China out.”】

item.title: 武伊契奇告诉《HRT》：欧洲央行在利率问题上处于 "有利位置
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）表示，他对当前的政策设置感到满意。【原文：The European Central Bank Governing Council member Boris Vujcic suggested he’s comfortable with the current policy settings.】
